actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 473 of title 18, United States Code, to provide penalties for the theft of obligations and securities of the United States and the possession and  sale of such stolen obligations and securities.

summary.text: Imposes criminal penalties of not more than a $5,000 fine, or imprisonment for not more than ten years, or both for the conviction of anyone who steals, or attempts to steal, any obligations or securities of the United States valued at $5,000 or more or receives such stolen securities for sale, or attempts to receive such for sale.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 473 of title 18, United States Code, to provide penalties for the theft of obligations and securities of the United States and the possession and  sale of such stolen obligations and securities.
